title: Thunderbird istallation

content: I am trying to download Thunderbird on my PC. I donated to Mozilla yesterday. When I try to install it asks for another donation.

title: Using Delete in Menu Bar, I can only delete from Unified Inbox, not individual accounts
creator: Tombarkas
content:
Sorry - I feel as though I'm monopolising this forum at the moment!

In my Menu bar, I have Delete, but, using this, I can only delete emails from the Unified list, not individual accounts. I CAN delete from individual accounts if I select the email, right click and select delete. Seems odd
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/143.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/143.0.0.0
